content: this pattern is not for sale/resale you may sell only the finished product but you must credit the gussied up goose for the design this pattern was designed for a standard sized porch goose 23 inches tall this pattern includes the hat the top and optional not pictured sleeves with wings this pattern has not been tested yet please send any issues directly to me what you will need yarn medium weight yarn in red and white hooks 4mm g-6 5 5 mm i scissors for cutting the yarn needle for sewing and weaving in ends optional pom-pom or make your own stitches you should know sts stitches slip knot chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet twice into one stitch decrease single_crochet 2 together half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hdc2tog half_double_crochet 2 together double_crochet double_crochet fphdc front post half_double_crochet magic_ring or any alternative to create a circle
